name: Lawn Pooper
description:
Lawn Pooper is about a young man and his feces filled rebellion against the lawn and the man. You must take 200 poops to make it to the next level. Don't let the police get too close or they'll steal your poop! 

W - Forward
S - Backwards
Left Mouse Click - Poop

Submitted for Weekly Game Jam - Week 142 - Theme:  Mischief
